11: The following nullifies one's Tawheed except

5.a: The oppressive ruler who changes the laws of Allah(swt)
5.b: The one who claims knowledge of the unseen
5.c: The one who is worshipped and pleased with it
5.d: The one who does not govern by what Allah(swt) has revealed
5.e: Satan who invites people to worship other than Allah (swt)

7.a: All the acts that are specific to Allah(swt) alone which no-one should ascribe to other than Allah(swt)
7.b: All the powers of Allah(swt) that controls the entire universe
7.c: All the acts of worship that should be directed to Him Alone
7.d: All the names and attributes, which no one should ascribe to other than Allah(swt)

11.a: Whoever mocks something from the din of the Messenger or the rewards of Allah or His punishment
11.b: Whoever places between him and Allah intermediaries
11.c: Aiding and supporting the mushrikin against the Muslimin
